Uses of Class
Objects

    • Uses of Objects in <Unnamed>

      Methods in <Unnamed> that return Objects 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Objects[][] View.getItems()
      This method is used to get the objects in the view, they will be stored in a 2D array with the type of object
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Objects 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Player.addInventory(Objects o)
      This method is used to add the objects to the player's inventory
      void Model.updateLocationAndDirection(Player p, Objects[][] items, boolean interact)
      This method is used to update the location and direction of the player character in the game.
